p: From Dec. 31st, 2019, the centers of disease controls (CDC) at all levels in mainland China jointly launched the COVID-19 investigation. Data of COVID-19 cases in China were obtained from the reports released by the China National Health Commissions (CNHC, http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) and local health commissions on the official websites, including 31 health commissions of province-level. Daily-confirmed cases, recovered cases and deaths of city-level from Jan. 1st to Apr. 6th, 2020 were collected. Data of Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan were not included in this study, because the methods used for data collection were different in these areas.
